summary: REQ-1 is partially implemented: branding constant and HTML title were updated to TickTaskTime, but thereâ€™s no evidence the header in App.tsx was updated to display the new name. missing_requirements.requirement: Update the header in `frontend/src/App.tsx` to display `TickTaskTime`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows changes to `frontend/src/branding.ts` and `frontend/index.html`, but does not show any modification to `frontend/src/App.tsx` or any evidence that the header text was updated.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded Publish & Share sheet functionality (copy link flow, open-in-new-tab button, embedded preview warning, public URL section UI) beyond just updating the App Market publishing instructions text.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 only requests clearer step-by-step English instructions in the existing "Publish to the App Market" section (no automation/integrations). The diff shows multiple additional UI sections and behaviors not mentioned in the request.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state update in `project_state.json` (new_feature_requests entries, projectName, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for project tracking/state file updates; this appears unrelated to the requested frontend branding/instructions changes.
